shri lankawe pihita athi yunesko loka uruma ( 1 mahanuwara puja nagaraya 2 sigiriya 3 anuradhapuraya 4 galla 5 polonnaruwa 6 rangiri dambaulu uyanwaththa rajamaha wiharaya 7 sinharaja wanantharaya 8 shri lankawe madhyama usbim 10 thawa balanna mahanuwara puja nagaraya[sanskaranaya] anuradhapuraya wanahi athithaye lakdiwa pawathi aga nagarayangen ekaki.
wisheshayen sumithra rahubaddhage ‘bumuthurunu’ (1978), ‘kelimandala’ (1984), ‘duladulaya’ (2007), ‘kandak se ma’ (2009), ‘aga pipi mal’ (2010) yana nawakatha nidasun lesa dakwiya haki ya.

balashakthi pirimasima ha parisara sanrakshana karmanthaya shakthimath kirima, nithiwirodhi wana sathun dadayam kirima ha ganudenu kirima thahanam kirima, gal anguru pirisidu ha karyakshama bhawithaya prawardhanaya kirima ha prathijanana balashakthi sanwardhanaya kirima athulu karunu eeta athulath ya. 10:40 mema wasare, china wyawasayanta adala badu ha gasthu thawaduratath adu kere ada(22) china jathika mahajana kongrasayata idiripath kerunu china rajya karya warthawata anuwa, me wasare chinaye nagarawala rakiya awastha wadi kirime nawa ilakkaya miliyana 9 kata wada wadi, nagarika wirakiya anupathaya 6% k wanu atha.

thawaduratath giya thana unwahansege wasthra galawa ethuman niruwath karana sahasikayo unwahanse kurusiyata thaba ana gasa golgatha kadu mudune sorun dedeneku mada situwa anthima husma watena thuru bala sitithi.
